ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" Sony Super HAD CCD image sensor
480 horizontal lines. Minimum Illumination: 0 Lux
Built-in 28 Infrared LEDs for night vision. 3.6mm Lens for wide angle
Weatherproof aluminum housing for outdoor indoor applications. NTSC signal system
Package included: 2x Sony CCD cameras, 2 x 12V DC 500mA power supplies and 2 x security warning decals
